description:
(Course Updated by June 22, 2016)

NOTICE

✪ SPECIAL BONUS: Exclusive Financial Ratio Analysis eBook (Value $149) for FREE if you take this course today!

⋅

✪ Learn the Proven Stock Valuation System That Helps You Spot Performance Trends of Any Business - Enroll Now!

⋅

☆☆☆☆☆ Welcome to The Complete Financial Statement Analysis Course ☆☆☆☆☆

As investors, it cannot be denied that performing a financial statement analysis is very difficult especially when you have no background in accounting. 

And that will be extremely time-consuming in case you don't know exactly where to start, or where you should start from.

There are dozens of accounting accounts reported on a company's financial statements. Imagine, if you have to evaluate all of those accounts one by one, you will never have enough time to find out more opportunities to make money in the stock market.

The only problem with value investing is that it requires a lot of work...and patience.

And that's why we decided to create this powerful training course - Just to help you perform your stock valuation the right way - the easiest way!

In this Financial Statement Analysis course, you'll learn exactly how you can analyze the financial position of any company that you want to invest in.

We'll give you all workable methods, investing metrics and criteria - we'll teach you the whole system that we've been using to find fundamentally strong businesses.

But that's not everything yet...

You will also learn how to utilize our most useful financial ratios and a lot of investing tips that can help you easily detect fraudulent activities and earnings manipulation in a business. 

And a good news is that...this program requires no initial investing skills and experience to get started. 

All you need to do is to learn through this course to understand how this powerful system works and apply the knowledge to find a good stock by yourself.

Another real truth is that...investing in today's stock markets is not as easy as before. So, every investor should find the right investment strategy that can help them protect and grow their money.

Financial education is truly crucial to not only the investors but to every single person who wants to get closer to their financial freedom. So, if you have a dream of retiring early or you want to stay financially free, you will need financial education. This Essential Stock Investing Course will be a shortcut for you to cut down your education time and help you build a better financial life.

⋅

❝ The greatest investment you can make is to invest in yourself! ❞

⋅

➲ In this powerful training, you will learn...

  • Learn the Complete Financial Ratio Analysis Process
  • Learn How to Analyze Your Company's Income Statement the Right Way
  • Learn How to Analyze Your Company's Balance Sheet the Right Way
  • Learn How to Analyze Your Company's Cash Flow the Right Way
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Profit
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Revenue
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Earnings per Share
  • Learn How to Perform a Common Size Statement Analysis
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Cash & Cash Equivalents
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Inventories
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Accounts Receivable
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Accounts Payable
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Equity
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Liabilities
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Operating Cash Flow
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Free Cash Flow
  • Learn How to Evaluate Your Company's Dividend Performance
  • And so on...

⋅

➲ What is more?

  • You will get a lifetime access to this course, without any limits!
  • The course will keep updating frequently, and of course all future updates are absolutely FREE if you enroll today!
  • Get dedicated supports from the course Instructors and the learning community anytime you need!
  • You ALWAYS get a 30-DAY FULL-MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, so don't hesitate to give yourself a chance to learn new things by just taking this course now!

⋅

➲ This is the complete system that we've been using to analyze and evaluate value stocks, and now you can learn it too - ENROLL NOW!
title: Value Investing: The Complete Financial Statement Analysis
